page.title: 19Childrens Leisure in Horwich
page.content:
The survey is based on what children do at night. {160 junior school children were {questioned.
The{most popular}activity was swimming with a total of{88}involved. {40}of the children go to music lessons at night. {40}of the children go to either the Brownies, Cubs or Guides. Only{3}children went to Karate, tennis, roller skating and badminton. There are some clubs which{none}of the children attend such as the cricket and youth clubs. The{most popular}night to go out was on Friday. The{least popular}was Thursday. {Three-quarters}of all the children do different activities at night after school.
